CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 22, 1969, pg. 7 reads: "During the Friday afternoon Career Conference at Crescent Elementary School, James Sheffy, general manager of Industrial Work, gives a demonstration before the class while other panelists look on.  They are from left: Mrs. Louise B. Smith, program coordinator and guidance counselor for the school; Ron Smith, assistant program director, Urban League; Mrs. Cynthia Ivey, fashion coordinator at Kaufmanns; James Scott, personnel department of Gimbels; William Pinnix, medical curator, the University of Pittsburgh; Lee Powers, laboratory technician at V.A. Hospital, and Mrs. Ruth Cox, secretary, Health Department of Urban League. -Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: James Sheffy giving demonstration before class while panelists look on, from left: Louise B. Smith, Ron Smith, Cynthia Ivey, James Scott, William Pinnix, Lee Powers, and Ruth Cox, in Crescent Elementary School for career conference
